doc:
Peggy McCay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_McCay 0 Margaret Ann "Peggy" McCay (November 3, 1927 – October 7, 2018), was an American actress whose career began in 1949, and includes theatre, television, soap operas, and feature films. McCay may be best known for originating the roles of Vanessa Dale on the CBS soap opera Love of Life (a role she played from 1951–55), and Caroline Brady, which she played from 1983 to 2016 on NBC's Days of Our Lives. Margaret_Ann_"_Peggy_"_McCay ( November_3_,_1927 – October_7_,_2018 ) , was an_American_actress whose_career began in 1949 , and includes theatre_,_television_,_soap_operas , and feature_films .
